channel.title: Miracle-RS 2006
channel.description:
[CENTER][SIZE=5][COLOR=#FF0000]Miracle-R S[/COLOR][/SIZE]
[COLOR=#FF0000][SIZE=4]Introduction:[/SIZE][/COLOR] [COLOR=#00FF00]Do you feel betrayed by Jagex Ltd.? You're not alone, thousands of people across the globe are disappointed with the recent updates of Runescape. A group of professional developers who go by the name of Miracle Real Solutions, have developed for the community a 2006 Remake which will bring back lost memories, and possibly a tear to the eye. Here at Miraclegoogle we strive to provide the finest game experience our community, and we are dedicated to constantly improve game content and add MORE quests each day! So register now and re-live you're past and don't make the same mistakes! Enjoy.
Sincerly,
Mod Miracle [/COLOR]
[COLOR=#FF0000][SIZE=4]Features:[/SIZE][/COLOR]
[COLOR=#00FF00]- 100% NPC Clipping - 100% Player Clipping - 100% Projectile Clipping - All skills working 100% - All minigames work - All bosses with correct anims, gfx, projectiles, etc.. - Convenient and unique webclient - Webpage Highscores - Perfect PvN - Perfect NvN - Perfect PvP (Multi/1 on 1) - Global NPC spawn - Global Shops just like RS (Correct items) - 10x Combat XP rate - All doors are working - Stable Economy - Multiple quests, adding more every week - All Npcs have correct drops, anims, gfx, projectiles - Fully operative Random events identical to RS[/COLOR]
[SIZE=4][COLOR=#FF0000]+[/COLOR][/SIZE] [COLOR=#00FF00]SO MUCH MORE CONTENT, BEAUTY IS WAITING FOR YOU'RE DISCOVERY![/COLOR]
YOU MUST REGISTER TO PLAY!
[URL=http://miracle-rs.com/forums/register.php][COLOR=#FF0000][U]Register[/U][/COLOR][/URL] [URL=http://play.miracle-rs.com][COLOR=#00FF00][U]Play[/U][/COLOR][/URL] [URL=http://forums.miracle-rs.com][COLOR=#FF0000][U]Forums[/U][/COLOR][/URL] [URL=http://miracle-rs.com][COLOR=#00FF00][U]Offical Website[/U][/COLOR][/URL]
[COLOR=#FF0000][SIZE=4]Media:[/SIZE][/COLOR]
[img]http://www.miracle-rs.com/pic1.png[/img]
[img]http://www.miracle-rs.com/pic2.png[/img]
[img]http://www.miracle-rs.com/pic3.png[/img]
[img]http://www.miracle-rs.com/pic4.png[/img]
[img]http://www.miracle-rs.com/pic5.png[/img]
[SIZE=4][COLOR=#FF0000]+[/COLOR][/SIZE] [COLOR=#00FF00]SO MUCH MORE MEDIA, WILL BE POSTING THE REST WHEN I GET HOME![/COLOR]
[/CENTER]

item.title: Miracle-RS 2006
item.dc:creator: @Miracle Miracle
item.description:
@Miracle wrote:

[CENTER][SIZE=5][COLOR=#FF0000]Miracle-R S[/COLOR][/SIZE]

[COLOR=#FF0000][SIZE=4]Introduction:[/SIZE][/COLOR]
[COLOR=#00FF00]Do you feel betrayed by Jagex Ltd.? You’re not alone, thousands of people across the globe are disappointed with the recent updates of Runescape. A group of professional developers who go by the name of Miracle Real Solutions, have developed for the community a 2006 Remake which will bring back lost memories, and possibly a tear to the eye. Here at Miraclegoogle we strive to provide the finest game experience our community, and we are dedicated to constantly improve game content and add MORE quests each day! So register now and re-live you’re past and don’t make the same mistakes! Enjoy.

Sincerly,

  • Fully operative Random events identical to RS[/COLOR]
